xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the shadow_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the shadow_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the shadow_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the shadow_test.

metadata.title: Test the username entity with the pattern match operation

metadata.title: Test that the collected shadow_item matches the specified entities
metadata.description: Make sure the collected shadow_item matches the specified entities and operations.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the username equals smithj, password equals Ep6mckrOLChF., chg_lst equals 10063, chg_allow equals 0, chg_req equals 99999, and exp_warn equals 7.
